Package org.stanwood.media.source

Interface Summary
IFilterElement This is used to filter elements from HTML parsing search results
IFilterLink This is used to filter links from HTML parsing search results
ISource This interfaces should be implemented by classes used to retrive information from a source.
 

Class Summary
FindFilmPosters Used to find film posters from different web sites
HybridFilmSource This class is a source used to retrieve the best film information it can.
IMDBSource This class is a source used to retrieve information about films from "www.imdb.com".
ParseHelper This class provides some static functions that help with parseing HTML data.
SearchHelper This class provides some helper functions that can be used to do things like construct a normalised search query from a file name.
TagChimpSource This class is a source used to retrieve information about films from "www.tagchimp.com".
TVCOMSource This source will pull TV show information from www.tv.com
WebFile Used to get the contents of a file or stream from the web
 

Exception Summary
NotInStoreException This is thrown when an attempt is made to retrieve data from a store, but it can't be found in the store.
SourceException This is thrown if their is a problem related to sources.
